thread.title: Re: Trump-a-Geddon? Sally Kohn just witnessed ‘the downfall of the republic’
thread.title_full: Re: Trump-a-Geddon? Sally Kohn just witnessed ‘the downfall of the republic’

author: thunderclancat
title: Re: Trump-a-Geddon? Sally Kohn just witnessed ‘the downfall of the republic’
text:
As we reported earlier, President Trump’s contentious press conference today triggered many journos to the point where NBC News’ Chuck Todd called Trump’s criticism of the media “un-American.” Among commentators, Sally Kohn was also distressed by what unfolded at Trump’s presser: Uh, is Trump insisting that Putin is bullying and provoking the United States BECAUSE OF THE MEDIA!??!?! 
— Sally Kohn (@sallykohn) February 16, 2017 "Nuclear holocaust would be like no other" says the guy who trivialized the nuclearization of the globe. 
— Sally Kohn (@sallykohn) February 16, 2017 SERIOUSLY?!?!?! Who asked the question about Melania!?!?!?!?!?And Trump praises THAT as a "nice question"For real people. 
— Sally Kohn (@sallykohn) February 16, 2017 CBC? What? Then Trump asked black journalist if he could set up meeting with Congressional Black Caucus. ARE YOU F*CKING KIDDING ME?!?!?!? 
— Sally Kohn (@sallykohn) February 16, 2017 Trending 'You did this to yourself'! No, Chuck Todd, you can't blame Trump for this 
Add it all up and here’s what it means, according to Kohn: Well, now I can tell my grandkids that I was there to watch the downfall of the republic. #TrumpPressConference 
— Sally Kohn (@sallykohn) February 16, 2017 
Just a little over-the-top maybe? 
— Dan O'Brien (@danobrien1972) February 16, 2017 He asked her because SHE asked the question about CBC.
